author: Neville Bokaba
comment: The application has made alot of great innovations. Its really amazing. Just two issues I personally have faced.  1. The video uploading takes long on mobile and to send.  2. It's affected by average/weak signal strength on mobile data/WiFi and as a result messages don't go through. I think it should be able to function irrespective of strength of any connection.

author: Michelle Wareham
comment: My issue is with the audible alerts once joined to a group - I use it for receiving important alerts and the sounds are tied to my phone general alert sounds.... all this is fine but new messages only sound for 2 weeks then silence. ... I have to keep clicking on it to see if there's anything new. .. can't have that... I have to reinstall again.

author: bhaskar subramani
comment: Brooo you are great. Where were you hiding in these years. We are all fooling by a 1 app starts leter with 'W'. You came to rescue us. You proved its not only limited features which is shown by W app. You are awsome. But you have to prove and make them realize about you by giving ads. So only we can use a lot.

author: Gregory Ybarra
comment: I absolutely love Telegram, I use it all the time, but I have one small issue with it. My friends and I, who have Galaxy S8's all experience the problem of not receiving notifications until after we've opened the app. If this problem could be fixed I would greatly appreciate it

author: mohamed Nafeel
comment: My only concern is about push notifications problem. some times I didn't get any notifications and sometimes it's ok. I am also using Samsung S8. I read reviews of this app. Most of users complain about notifications problem. My request to telegram is to rectify this problem ASAP and fix it. it's really very important to the users.

author: The Brandonator!
comment: I would like to be able to use this app but am blind, and so rely on talk back to interact with my phone and other Android devices. This app is completely incompatible with Talkback. I'm talking about totally incompatible. It's not just that talk back isn't able to convey to me that there are unlabeled buttons, TalkBack isn't able to convey any  kind of information about any other controls present in this app. I am completely unable to use this app. Please consider updating this app so that it is at least partially usable 4 people relying on the TalkBack service. If you won't, then I hope the world recognizes you as the discriminatory company that you will then be.

author: Youhour Kaing
comment: As always been the best app. The last 2 updates were horrible. Till now the contacts remain a major issue. Please fix asap. Contacts are all over the place and some contacts didn't show up as names on telegram. Annoying as..

author: Kyra Jung
comment: Okay why my telegram keeps saying 'connecting'?? I cant send the texts or update my profile or anything? When im using a good wifi?? I tried to unistall and then install it back but its still the same. Pls fix this asap. Im a student. I need telegram okay. Thanks.

This is a great application no doubt. But now i need help. One bad people somehow got my number and code and created a account. I'm afraid he created any crim using my number. That's why I need help. How can I dead this account. Please reply early.

author: AKSHEY KUMAR
comment: Why don't you send code through SMS? My account is opened is different phone and now someone has access to my account. If you can help I will be glad. Worst services

author: Farnoosh Mk
comment: Sometimes when someone joines telegram, I won't get a notification or others won't notice it if I join. Recently when you reply to a message, it is shown with delay. Otherwise it is the best messaging app ever. :)

author: Brook Powers
comment: Love this app! It feels secure and has good customizable options for notifications (like turning them off completely). My only complaint is the quick bar that pops up with stickers when you use emojis. I have sent WAY too many crying/laughing Frank's on accident. I like the stickers, but not enough to deal with that inconvenience, so I deleted all of the sticker packages and I won't be using them anymore.

author: Ruzaihan Junit
comment: From 5 to 3⭐ I used to love telegram as it's easier for ke to download pic or other media in a slow network. But currently it's not like that anymore. I can download pic from WhatsApp faster within the same network. Hate it!

author: Counselor Eng.Wael Elgohary
comment: it is perfect application but We suffer from Server failure some time which is very critical problem. moreover technical support is not active to respond we need live chat with technical support. we also suggest to be enhanced the channels in main & Sub channels i guess this shall be a real jump in the application

author: Valentino Kujundžić
comment: The best designed app I've ever seen! It is a perfect messaging app. Keeps it simple unless you want to mess with details- and it has ability to change all the settings you want. The only problem is that is has no userbase in the place I'm living, but I'll try to draw more people to use this beautiful, simple, secure and feature-rich  messaging app!

author: Nikolas Hughes
comment: Please stop reducing the quality/resolution of videos sent! I'm trying to stay in touch with family. Your transmission of high resolution videos are all pixelated, very disappointing. Shouldn't it be my choice whether to save data or not?

author: Preston Wilson
comment: This is my favorite messaging app and I use it daily. But I'm rating it 1* because the sexually explicit "trending stickers" prevent me from having my children use it on their phones (so I'm stuck using inferior apps to message my kids). Add parental controls, especially for stickers, and I'll give you 5*.

Hi . I can not thank you enough for making this remarkable app .  Talking to my friends and family is much better and i love the theme and how you make the app work so smooth . Just work on the direct share so that you can send a post to many people at one try . Thank you again .  Arsalan zarbi

author: Patricia Bornales
comment: Does anyone encounter not being able to screen capture when using telegram? Im not able to capture my screen when im using this app on my phone. Been exploring the settings in the app and in my phone, nothing seem to be the problem. Any help?

author: Sai Mahidhar
comment: Best messaging app  Man this this thing can work with weakest of data connections .....trust me i have seen it work when I needed it the most in remote areas. 1)it  is the best app for privacy ...hell this thing even prevents your phone from taking screenshots of your chats . 2)it's encrypted and secure  3) u can secure the app with a  password  4)two tire security system  5) lot of channels to subscribe to  6) it consumes the least data when u use it  7)you can send mp3 files  8)you can send files up to 1.5 GB  Overall this is the best app out there

author: Dillon Underwood
comment: I use Telegram to message my boyfriend. Switched from Skype after it had become too unwieldy and slow. Telegram is light and fast and excels at messaging.

author: Azmil Abd Rahman
comment: Can you enable mark or mak all option for deleting the chats ? How could you delete one by one the chats. So tired. Thank you.

author: ST_ InfinityXz
comment: I think it's an overall versatile and useful app. However I feel that it's still lacking some key features like group calls and also the ability to choose whether or not to appear Online.

author: Jay Gambol
comment: The app all in itself is great. It's faster than what I've been using, though, I have some issues, that being: I don't get notified I have a new message when I'm on another app or just when my phone is on standby even when I have my notifs set for urgent/important. Please fix, thank you for your hard work.

author: Joseph Ikogho
comment: I suggest Telegram come up with a feature to allow one Pin an important message within a group to the top, so other less important chats don't push the important ones to the bottom. This was why I asked my group members to head over to Telegram, only to realize the feature isn't available.  I would be most elated if this can be done ASAP.  I manage different groups and it is a chore trying to repeat vital information to team members every time.  👍

author: JingLiang Low
comment: Was a great app until today. Suddenly I can't get connected. Tried to re-install, and totally can't log in now. Please fix this issue asap! Will change my rating then.

author: Jesus Moreno
comment: Best app for communication. Better than WhatssApp. NEW FEATURES I WANT: - When you click on a profile image, the image pop up, dont enter to the chat (like WhatsApp). - When you long-press a message in a group, see who has read the message and who has received the message (like WhatsApp)

author: Simo Bd
comment: Please add more privacy controls to the profile pictures. Please, it is really concerning that anyone with my phone number can get access to my profile pictures without my permission!! Just add that extra privacy to help us be more secure

author: Naram Shashank
comment: I use this app only for tv series boot but that has not been working from couple of weeks could u please have a look at it or atleast give me any suggestions to ivercome this issues

author: parvathy s chandran
comment: Love this app. I am a user since it was launched. Since then seeing and loving every update. Actually all its features are unique and perfect than any other messenger app. But unfortunately it is not getting the popularity it deserves.

author: Javier Casares
comment: I really don't see why some people distrust or dislike WhatsApp and use only Telegram. I really dislike its design and even some features. What I do like is that it has a proper Windows application.

author: Elex
comment: Not really sure what happened in the past month or so with the recent updates, but I'm getting really sick of not receiving notifications until I have to open the app myself or get other alerts that trigger a telegram notification, as if it forgot that it needed to do that and something else has to remind it how it functions.  This happens with me and my friends who all also have android (Samsung 8s) so don't know if this is an android problem or not but it needs to be fixed before we find an alternative. We are all tired of thinking everyone is ignoring each other when it's just telegram being a dick. Update, notifications still not working

author: Saeid Oraei
comment: many problem with this app.most of the users of this app are iranian but persian(پارسی) isnt available and video call is blocked easily by gov.by the latest update contact names have problem.fix it plz

This app is good but unfortunately it is not accessible to the blind and the visually impaired people. This is because the screen readers such as Google talkback can't read any text or notification or even navigating the whole app. If you fix this issue you'll deserve all the star ratings. Many thanks.

author: Jasmine Foo
comment: Have been redownloading telegram for a few times due to out of sudden no notification when i did not put on silent mode. Its a little pissed off when there is important message sending in but there is no notifications. Dont mind just make it better for the notifications.

author: Devendar R
comment: Every thing is fine. .....but v need a video call update......change in emoji...there is no video call option that's y every one r switching to what's app.....so plz it's request to give an video call update..

author: T. N.
comment: Please fix led issue on android. It shows only as violet. Though i have used other colors like orange, cyan etc. There is some problem with led settings

author: Janessa Taitano
comment: This app has been great BUT lately I am not getting notified of my new messages until at least 5 minutes later or sometimes not at all. This is very alarming because I depend on this app for speedy and up to date communication. Please fix this

author: biarstiq Productions
comment: This app is good for instant messaging and sharing media , indeed my favorite one , but it has one problem , sometimes connectivity issues remain there for a lot of time and it hasn't got video call feature , please get it in the next update. + there should be double tick feature for delivery of messages and a separate feature for read receipts, badly need that

author: ILYA A.
comment: NOT RELIABLE NOTIFICATIONS(don't come unless u open the app), Oneplus 5,Android 8.0.0. Also, no way to turn of  read receipts.
